description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Marseille, France. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Palatial Five-Star Mediterranean Escape on France's South Coast with Michelin-Starred Restaurant
hotels.description: Opulence, charm and history go hand-in-hand at the InterContinental Marseille - Hotel Dieu, housed in a restored 12th-century building set amid the spectacular Panier neighbourhood. Indulge in a rejuvenating facial at the acclaimed Spa by Clarins or enjoy a decadent meal inspired by local cuisine at the Michelin-starred Alcyone restaurant. For an inspiring night out, explore the Vieux Port, stunning architecture and world-class dining options on your doorstep.

hotels.title: Elegant Marseille France Stay near Le Dôme Concert Hall
hotels.description: Uncover the captivating history of France's oldest city from the refined elegance of Crowne Plaza Marseille - Le Dôme, an IHG Hotel. Delight in a culinary journey at Cucina Victoria restaurant, tantalizing your taste buds with exquisite wines and gastronomic flare. Indulge in a refreshing dip in the seasonal outdoor swimming pool. Beyond your doors, immerse yourself in the vibrant music scene at the nearby Le Dôme concert hall or meander through the ancient streets of Marseille.
